channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- SiteOrigin Widgets Bundle
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- SiteOrigin Widgets Bundle

item.title: CVE-2023-6295|2024-08-02T08:28:21.296Z -- unknown -- siteorigin%20widgets%20bundle
item.description: The SiteOrigin Widgets Bundle WordPress plugin before 1.51.0 does not validate user input before using it to generate paths passed to include function/s, allowing users with the administrator role to perform LFI attacks in the context of Multisite WordPress sites.
